document_data.name: City Guard of Liham
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Liham]] served as a police force within the city as well as a standing army for the "City of Soldiers".
document_data.Organization: The composition of the city guard as of {{Yearlink|1367}}{{AQ-time}} was 6,000 infantry, 600 cavalry, and several detachments of [[mamluk]]s from [[Qudra]] numbering 200 men per unit. Mamluks of the [[Dutiful Mamluk Society]] served as the palace guard. Liham's navy consisted of only three ships.
document_data.Activities: The navy patrolled the waters of the [[Great Sea]] off the coast as well as inland along [[Al-Sari River]].
